doc:
Sal Mineo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sal_Mineo 0 Salvatore Mineo, Jr. (January 10, 1939 – February 12, 1976), was an American film and theatre actor who is known for his performance as John "Plato" Crawford opposite James Dean in the iconic film Rebel Without a Cause (1955). Mineo was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his roles in Rebel Without a Cause and Exodus (1960). Salvatore_Mineo , Jr. ( January_10_,_1939 – February_12_,_1976 ) , was an_American_film_and_theatre_actor who is_known for his_performance as John_"_Plato_"_Crawford_opposite_James_Dean in the_iconic_film_Rebel Without a_Cause ( 1955 ) . Mineo was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for Best Supporting_Actor for his_roles in Rebel Without a_Cause and Exodus_(_1960_) .
